description:
Finally scaling the elephant`s back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!
Ein gefährlicher Aufstieg – Das Abenteuer auf dem Rücken des Elefanten!
Kesshi no Tozou: Kyozou no Se no Daibouken!
Une ascension d`éléphant mortelle. Une grande aventure à dos d`éléphant !
Смертельный подъем на слона! Большое приключение на спине Гигантского Слона!
決死の登象 巨象の背の大冒険!
